metadata.Title: CVE-2023-24537 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Calling any of the Parse functions on Go source code which contains //linedirectives with very large line numbers can cause an infinite loop due tointeger overflow.

criterions.comment: golang-1.6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
golang-1.10: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
golang-1.13: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
